Package board

Class Game

java.lang.Object
board.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game class: keeps track of the board pieces and possible moves,
Author:
Om Shah (os207), Yash Patel (ykp15)

    • simulateBoard

      public void simulateBoard()
      simulateBoard() method: this is called before/after a move

    • activePiece

      public boolean activePiece(int[] startCords, int[] endCords, boolean whiteMove)
      activePiece() method: sees if a move is valid sees if a king is in check
      Parameters:
      startCords - gets coordinate when piece is being moved
      endCords - gets coordinate after the piece is moved
      whiteMove - shows whos turn it is
      Returns:
      shows true if valid and invalid if false

    • returnCheck

      public boolean returnCheck()

    • enPassPoss

      public void enPassPoss(boolean whiteTurn)
      enPassPoss() method: stops en passant after one turn checks all pieces in the row and sets the piece's en passant value to false
      Parameters:
      whiteTurn - checks if it is white's turn and keeps track of y value

    • gettingIndex

      public static int[] gettingIndex(String str)
      gettingIndex() method: this translate it into coordinates
      Parameters:
      str - string to be translated
      Returns:
      produces an array of coordinates

    • getKingCords

      public int[] getKingCords(boolean wKing)
      getKingCords() method: finds the king's coordinates
      Parameters:
      wKing - true if finding white king coordinates, false if finding black king coordinates
      Returns:
      coordinates of the king of the color specified by the parameter

    • kingPossibleMove

      public boolean kingPossibleMove(int[] startCords, int[] endCords, boolean wKing)
      kingPossibleMove() method: shows if a king can make a particular move
      Parameters:
      startCords - shows the coordinates of the king starting position
      endCords - shows the coordinates of the kings ending pos
      wKing - where white king means true and black king means false
      Returns:
      shows true if the king can move and false if king can not move or if it is in check

    • inCheck

      public boolean inCheck(int[] startCords, boolean wKing)
      inCheck() mehod: shows if piece has king in chekc
      Parameters:
      startCords - coordinates of piece that may be putting king in check
      wKing - true if the king is in check, false if black king is in check
      Returns:
      returns true if the piece puts the king in check, returns false otherwise

    • inCheckmate

      public boolean inCheckmate(boolean wKing)
      inCheckmate() method: shows the end of the game if the king move can be out of check shows false if any moves does not have king back to check
      Parameters:
      wKing - shows true if the white king is in check false if not
      Returns:
      shows true if there are not legal moves, false if otherwise
